20110113020014.000|20110113020019.000|CC1|THESE MEN AND WOMEN REMIND US   
20110113020019.000|20110113020022.000|CC1|THAT HEROISM IS FOUND NOT ONLY  
20110113020022.000|20110113020024.000|CC1|ON THE FIELD OF BATTLE.         
20110113020024.000|20110113020027.000|CC1|THEY REMIND US THAT HEROISM DOES
20110113020027.000|20110113020028.000|CC1|NOT REQUIRE SPECIAL TRAINING OR 
20110113020028.000|20110113020030.000|CC1|PHYSICAL STRENGTH.              
20110113020030.000|20110113020035.000|CC1|HEROISM IS HERE.                
20110113020035.000|20110113020037.000|CC1|IN THE HEARTS OF SO MANY OF OUR 
20110113020037.000|20110113020039.000|CC1|FELLOW CITIZENS, ALL AROUND US, 
20110113020039.000|20110113020043.000|CC1|JUST WAITING TO BE SUMMONED.    
20110113020043.000|20110113020054.000|CC1|AS IT WAS ON SATURDAY MORNING.  
20110113020054.000|20110113020056.000|CC1|THEIR ACTIONS, THEIR            
20110113020056.000|20110113020057.000|CC1|SELFLESSNESS POSES A CHALLENGE  
20110113020057.000|20110113020101.000|CC1|TO EACH OF US.                  
20110113020101.000|20110113020106.000|CC1|IT RAISES THE QUESTION OF WHAT, 
20110113020106.000|20110113020109.000|CC1|BEYOND PRAYERS AND EXPRESSIONS  
20110113020109.000|20110113020110.000|CC1|OF CONCERN, IS REQUIRED OF US,  
20110113020110.000|20110113020115.000|CC1|GOING FORWARD.                  
20110113020115.000|20110113020120.000|CC1|HOW CAN WE HONOR THE FALLEN.    
20110113020120.000|20110113020122.000|CC1|HOW CAN WE BE TRUE TO THEIR     
20110113020122.000|20110113020127.000|CC1|MEMORY?                         
20110113020127.000|20110113020130.000|CC1|YOU SEE, WHEN A TRAGEDY LIKE    
20110113020130.000|20110113020133.000|CC1|THIS STRIKES, IT IS PART OF OUR 
20110113020133.000|20110113020136.000|CC1|NATURE TO DEMAND EXPLANATIONS.  
20110113020136.000|20110113020139.000|CC1|TO TRY TO IMPOSE SOME ORDER ON  
20110113020139.000|20110113020142.000|CC1|THE CHAOS.                      
20110113020142.000|20110113020144.000|CC1|AND MAKE SENSE OUT OF THAT WHICH
20110113020144.000|20110113020152.000|CC1|SEEMS SENSELESS.                
20110113020152.000|20110113020155.000|CC1|ALREADY, WE'VE SEEN A NATIONAL  
20110113020155.000|20110113020156.000|CC1|CONVERSATION COMMENCE, NOT ONLY 
20110113020156.000|20110113020159.000|CC1|ABOUT THE MOTIVATION BEHIND     
20110113020159.000|20110113020202.000|CC1|THESE KILLINGS BUT FROM ABOUT   
20110113020202.000|20110113020205.000|CC1|EVERYTHING FROM GUN SAFETY LAWS 
20110113020205.000|20110113020208.000|CC1|TO THE ADEQUACY OF OUR MENTAL   
20110113020208.000|20110113020209.000|CC1|HEALTH.                         
20110113020209.000|20110113020211.000|CC1|AND MUCH, MUCH OF THIS PROCESS  
20110113020211.000|20110113020213.000|CC1|OF DEBATING WHAT MIGHT BE DONE  
20110113020213.000|20110113020216.000|CC1|TO PREVENT SUCH TRAGEDIES IN THE
20110113020216.000|20110113020220.000|CC1|FUTURE IS AN ESSENTIAL          
20110113020220.000|20110113020221.000|CC1|INGREDIENT IN OUR EXERCISE OF   
20110113020221.000|20110113020228.000|CC1|SELF-GOVERNMENT.                
20110113020228.000|20110113020232.000|CC1|BUT AT A TIME WHEN OUR DISCOURSE
20110113020232.000|20110113020235.000|CC1|HAS BECOME SO SHARPLY POLARIZED,
20110113020235.000|20110113020237.000|CC1|AND AT A TIME WHEN WE ARE FAR   
20110113020237.000|20110113020240.000|CC1|TOO EAGER TO LAY THE BLAME FOR  
20110113020240.000|20110113020244.000|CC1|ALL THAT AILS THE WORLD AT THE  
20110113020244.000|20110113020245.000|CC1|FEET OF THOSE WHO HAPPEN TO     
20110113020245.000|20110113020248.000|CC1|THINK DIFFERENTLY THAN WE DO,   
20110113020248.000|20110113020252.000|CC1|IT'S IMPORTANT FOR US TO PAUSE  
20110113020252.000|20110113020255.000|CC1|FOR A MOMENT AND MAKE SURE THAT 
20110113020255.000|20110113020257.000|CC1|WE'RE TALKING WITH EACH OTHER IN
20110113020257.000|20110113020300.000|CC1|A WAY THAT HEALS.               
20110113020300.000|20110113020319.000|CC1|NOT IN A WAY THAT WOUNDS.       
20110113020319.000|20110113020321.000|CC1|SCRIPTURE TELLS US THAT THERE IS
20110113020321.000|20110113020325.000|CC1|EVIL IN THE WORLD.              
20110113020325.000|20110113020327.000|CC1|AND THE THAT TERRIBLE THINGS    
20110113020327.000|20110113020328.000|CC1|HAPPEN FOR REASONS THAT DEFY    
20110113020328.000|20110113020332.000|CC1|HUMAN UNDERSTANDING.            
20110113020332.000|20110113020336.000|CC1|IN THE WORDS OF JOBE, WHEN I    
20110113020336.000|20110113020340.000|CC1|LOOK FOR LIGHT THEN CAME        
20110113020340.000|20110113020342.000|CC1|DARKNESS.                       
20110113020342.000|20110113020345.000|CC1|BAD THINGS HAPPEN AND WE HAVE TO
20110113020345.000|20110113020345.000|CC1|GUARD AGAINST SIMPLE            
20110113020345.000|20110113020349.000|CC1|EXPLANATIONS IN THE AFTERMATH.  
20110113020349.000|20110113020352.000|CC1|BUT THE TRUTH IS, NONE OF US CAN
20110113020352.000|20110113020352.000|CC1|KNOW EXACTLY WHAT TRIGGERED THIS
20110113020352.000|20110113020356.000|CC1|VICIOUS ATTACK.                 
20110113020356.000|20110113020358.000|CC1|NONE OF US CAN KNOW WITH ANY    
20110113020358.000|20110113020401.000|CC1|CERTAINTY WHAT MIGHT HAVE       
20110113020401.000|20110113020404.000|CC1|STOPPED THESE SHOTS FROM BEING  
20110113020404.000|20110113020407.000|CC1|FIRED OR WHAT THOUGHTS LURKED IN
20110113020407.000|20110113020410.000|CC1|THE INNERRECESSES OF A VIOLENT  
20110113020410.000|20110113020413.000|CC1|MAN'S MIND.                     
20110113020413.000|20110113020416.000|CC1|YES, WE HAVE TO EXAMINE ALL THE 
20110113020416.000|20110113020419.000|CC1|FACTS BEHIND THIS TRAGEDY.      
20110113020419.000|20110113020421.000|CC1|WE CANNOT AND WILL NOT BE       
20110113020421.000|20110113020424.000|CC1|PASSIVE IN THE FACE OF SUCH     
20110113020424.000|20110113020424.000|CC1|VIOLENCE.                       
20110113020424.000|20110113020426.000|CC1|WE SHOULD BE WILLING TO         
20110113020426.000|20110113020427.000|CC1|CHALLENGE OLD ASSUMPTIONS IN    
20110113020427.000|20110113020431.000|CC1|ORDER TO LESSEN THE PROSPECTS OF
20110113020431.000|20110113020444.000|CC1|SUCH VIOLENCE IN THE FUTURE.    
20110113020444.000|20110113020448.000|CC1|BUT WHAT WE CANNOT DO IS USE    
20110113020448.000|20110113020449.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY AS ONE MORE        
20110113020449.000|20110113020455.000|CC1|OCCASION TO TURN ON EACH OTHER. 
20110113020455.000|20110113020514.000|CC1|THAT WE CANNOT DO.              
20110113020514.000|20110113020520.000|CC1|THAT, WE CANNOT DO.             
20110113020520.000|20110113020522.000|CC1|AS WE DISCUSS THESE ISSUES, LET 
20110113020522.000|20110113020525.000|CC1|EACH OF US DO SO WITH A GOOD    
20110113020525.000|20110113020528.000|CC1|DOSE OF HUMILITY, RATHER THAN   
20110113020528.000|20110113020528.000|CC1|POINTING FINGERS OR ASSIGNING   
20110113020528.000|20110113020531.000|CC1|BLAME.                          
20110113020531.000|20110113020536.000|CC1|LET'S USE THIS OCCASION TO      
20110113020536.000|20110113020538.000|CC1|EXPAND OUR MORAL IMAGINATIONS,  
20110113020538.000|20110113020541.000|CC1|TO LISTEN TO EACH OTHER MORE    
20110113020541.000|20110113020541.000|CC1|CAREFULLY.                      
20110113020541.000|20110113020545.000|CC1|TO SHARPEN OUR INSTINCTS FOR    
20110113020545.000|20110113020545.000|CC1|EMPATHY.                        
20110113020545.000|20110113020547.000|CC1|AND REMIND OURSELVES OF ALL OF  
20110113020547.000|20110113020549.000|CC1|THE WAYS THAT OUR HOPES AND     
20110113020549.000|20110113020558.000|CC1|DREAMS ARE BOUND TOGETHER.      
20110113020558.000|20110113020602.000|CC1|AFTER ALL, AFTER ALL, THAT'S    
20110113020602.000|20110113020605.000|CC1|WHAT MOST OF US DO WHEN WE LOSE 
20110113020605.000|20110113020607.000|CC1|SOMEBODY IN OUR FAMILY,         
20110113020607.000|20110113020608.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY IF THE LOSS IS       
20110113020608.000|20110113020612.000|CC1|UNEXPECTED.                     
20110113020612.000|20110113020615.000|CC1|WE'RE SHAKEN OUT OF OUR         
20110113020615.000|20110113020616.000|CC1|ROUTINES.                       
20110113020616.000|20110113020620.000|CC1|WE'RE FORCED TO LOOK INWARD.    
20110113020620.000|20110113020625.000|CC1|WE REFLECT ON THE PAST.         
20110113020625.000|20110113020628.000|CC1|AND WE SPEND ENOUGH TIME WITH AN
20110113020628.000|20110113020631.000|CC1|AGING PARENT, WE WONDER, DID WE 
20110113020631.000|20110113020632.000|CC1|EXPRESS OUR GRATITUDE FOR ALL   
20110113020632.000|20110113020634.000|CC1|THE SACRIFICES THAT THEY MADE   
20110113020634.000|20110113020636.000|CC1|FOR US.                         
20110113020636.000|20110113020640.000|CC1|DID WE TELL A SPOUSE JUST HOW   
20110113020640.000|20110113020642.000|CC1|DESPERATELY WE LOVE THEM.       
20110113020642.000|20110113020643.000|CC1|NOT JUST ONCE IN A WHILE BUT    
20110113020643.000|20110113020650.000|CC1|EVERY SINGLE DAY.               
20110113020650.000|20110113020653.000|CC1|SO SOME LOSS CAUSES TO US LOOK  
20110113020653.000|20110113020656.000|CC1|BACKWARD, BUT IT ALSO FORCES US 
20110113020656.000|20110113020658.000|CC1|TO LOOK FORWARD, TO REFLECT ON  
20110113020658.000|20110113020700.000|CC1|THE PRESENT AND THE FUTURE.     
20110113020700.000|20110113020702.000|CC1|ON THE MANNER IN WHICH WE LIVE  
20110113020702.000|20110113020703.000|CC1|OUR LIVES.                      
20110113020703.000|20110113020706.000|CC1|AND NURTURE OUR RELATIONSHIPS   
20110113020706.000|20110113020707.000|CC1|WITH THOSE WHO ARE STILL WITH   
20110113020707.000|20110113020720.000|CC1|US.                             
20110113020720.000|20110113020724.000|CC1|WE MAY ASK OURSELVES IF WE'VE   
20110113020724.000|20110113020728.000|CC1|SHOWN ENOUGH KINDNESS AND       
20110113020728.000|20110113020728.000|CC1|GENEROSITY AND COMPASSION TO THE
20110113020728.000|20110113020735.000|CC1|PEOPLE IN OUR LIVES.            
20110113020735.000|20110113020736.000|CC1|PERHAPS WE QUESTION WHETHER     
20110113020736.000|20110113020739.000|CC1|WE'RE DOING RIGHT BY OUR        
20110113020739.000|20110113020740.000|CC1|CHILDREN OR OUR COMMUNITY,      
20110113020740.000|20110113020741.000|CC1|WHETHER OUR PRIORITIES ARE IN   
20110113020741.000|20110113020746.000|CC1|ORDER.                          
20110113020746.000|20110113020749.000|CC1|WE RECOGNIZE OUR OWN MORTALITY. 
20110113020749.000|20110113020752.000|CC1|AND WE ARE REMINDED THAT IN THE 
20110113020752.000|20110113020755.000|CC1|FLEETING TIME WE HAVE ON THIS   
20110113020755.000|20110113020757.000|CC1|EARTH, WHAT MATTERS IS NOT      
20110113020757.000|20110113020801.000|CC1|WEALTH OR STATUS OR POWER OR    
20110113020801.000|20110113020802.000|CC1|FAME, BUT, RATHER, HOW WELL WE  
20110113020802.000|20110113020806.000|CC1|HAVE LOVED.                     
20110113020806.000|20110113020809.000|CC1|AND WHAT SMALL PART WE HAVE     
20110113020809.000|20110113020810.000|CC1|PLAYED IN MAKING THE LIVES OF   
20110113020810.000|20110113020828.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE BETTER.            
20110113020828.000|20110113020832.000|CC1|AND THAT PROCESS THAT PROCESS OF
20110113020832.000|20110113020834.000|CC1|REFLECTION OF MAKING SURE WE    
20110113020834.000|20110113020838.000|CC1|ALIGN OUR VALUES WITH OUR       
20110113020838.000|20110113020840.000|CC1|ACTIONS, THAT, I BELIEVE, IS    
20110113020840.000|20110113020844.000|CC1|WHAT A TRAGEDY LIKE THIS        
20110113020844.000|20110113020845.000|CC1|REQUIRES.                       
20110113020845.000|20110113020847.000|CC1|FOR THOSE WHO ARE HARMED, THOSE 
20110113020847.000|20110113020851.000|CC1|WHO WERE KILLED, THEY ARE PART  
20110113020851.000|20110113020853.000|CC1|OF OUR FAMILY, AN AMERICAN      
20110113020853.000|20110113020903.000|CC1|FAMILY, 300 MILLION STRONG.     
20110113020903.000|20110113020907.000|CC1|WE MAY NOT HAVE KNOWN THEM

20110113020909.000|20110113020916.000|CC1|OURSELVES IN THEM.              
20110113020916.000|20110113020922.000|CC1|IN GEORGE, IN DOT AND DORWAN AND
20110113020922.000|20110113020925.000|CC1|MAUDY, WE SENSE THE ABIDING LOVE
20110113020925.000|20110113020928.000|CC1|WE HAVE FOR OUR OWN WIVES, OUR

20110113020932.000|20110113020933.000|CC1|PHI                             
20110113020933.000|20110113020934.000|CC1|PHYLLIS, SHE'S OUR MOM OR       
20110113020934.000|20110113020935.000|CC1|GRANDMOM.                       
20110113020935.000|20110113020940.000|CC1|GABE, OUR BROTHER OR SON.       
20110113020940.000|20110113020943.000|CC1|AND JUDGE ROLL, WE RECOGNIZE NOT
20110113020943.000|20110113020948.000|CC1|ONLY A MAN WHO PRIDES HIS FAMILY
20110113020948.000|20110113020950.000|CC1|AND DOING HIS JOB WELL, BUT ALSO
20110113020950.000|20110113020952.000|CC1|A MAN WHO EMBODIED AMERICA'S    
20110113020952.000|20110113020954.000|CC1|FIDELITY TO THE LAW.            
20110113020954.000|20110113020957.000|CC1|AND IN GABBY, GABBY, WE SEE A   
20110113020957.000|20110113021000.000|CC1|REFLECTION OF OUR PUBLIC        
20110113021000.000|20110113021003.000|CC1|SPIRITEDNESS, THAT DESIRE TO    
20110113021003.000|20110113021005.000|CC1|PARTICIPATE IN THAT SOMETIMES   
20110113021005.000|20110113021008.000|CC1|FRUSTRATING, SOMETIMES          
20110113021008.000|20110113021010.000|CC1|CONTENTIOUS, BUT ALWAYS         
20110113021010.000|20110113021012.000|CC1|NECESSARY AND NEVER-ENDING      
20110113021012.000|20110113021013.000|CC1|PROCESS TO FORM A MORE PERFECT  
20110113021013.000|20110113021028.000|CC1|UNION.                          
20110113021028.000|20110113021032.000|CC1|AND IN CHRISTINA, IN CHRISTINA, 
20110113021032.000|20110113021038.000|CC1|WE SEE ALL OF OUR CHILDREN.     
20110113021038.000|20110113021043.000|CC1|SO CURIOUS, SO TRUSTING SO      
20110113021043.000|20110113021048.000|CC1|ENERGETIC, SO FULL OF MAGIC, SO 
20110113021048.000|20110113021052.000|CC1|DESERVING OF OUR LOVE.          
20110113021052.000|20110113021058.000|CC1|AND SO DESERVING OF OUR GOOD    
20110113021058.000|20110113021058.000|CC1|EXAMPLE.                        
20110113021058.000|20110113021101.000|CC1|IF THIS TRAGEDY PROMPTS         
20110113021101.000|20110113021104.000|CC1|REFLECTION AND DEBATE AS IT     
20110113021104.000|20110113021106.000|CC1|SHOULD, LET'S MAKE SURE IT'S    
20110113021106.000|20110113021122.000|CC1|WORTHY OF THOSE WE HAVE LOST.   
20110113021122.000|20110113021124.000|CC1|LET'S MAKE SURE IT'S NOT ON THE 
20110113021124.000|20110113021127.000|CC1|USUAL PLANE OF POLITICS AND     
20110113021127.000|20110113021129.000|CC1|POINTS SCORING AND PETTINESS    
20110113021129.000|20110113021130.000|CC1|THAT DRIFTS AWAY IN THE NEXT    
20110113021130.000|20110113021133.000|CC1|NEWS CYCLE.                     
20110113021133.000|20110113021135.000|CC1|THE LOSS OF THESE WONDERFUL     
20110113021135.000|20110113021138.000|CC1|PEOPLE SHOULD MAKE EVERY ONE OF 
20110113021138.000|20110113021140.000|CC1|US STRIVE TO BE BETTER, TO BE   
20110113021140.000|20110113021143.000|CC1|BETTER IN OUR PRIVATE LIVES, TO 
20110113021143.000|20110113021145.000|CC1|BE BETTER FRIENDS AND NEIGHBORS 
20110113021145.000|20110113021151.000|CC1|AND CO-WORKERS AND PARENTS.     
20110113021151.000|20110113021154.000|CC1|AND IF, AS HAS BEEN DISCUSSED IN
20110113021154.000|20110113021157.000|CC1|RECENT DAYS, THEIR DEATH HELPS  
20110113021157.000|20110113021159.000|CC1|USHER IN MORE STABILITY IN OUR  
20110113021159.000|20110113021201.000|CC1|PUBLIC DISCOURSE, LET US        
20110113021201.000|20110113021203.000|CC1|REMEMBER IT IS NOT BECAUSE A    
20110113021203.000|20110113021205.000|CC1|SIMPLE LACK OF CIVILITY CAUSED  
20110113021205.000|20110113021209.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY, IT DID NOT.       
20110113021209.000|20110113021212.000|CC1|BUT, RATHER, BECAUSE ONLY A MORE
20110113021212.000|20110113021214.000|CC1|CIVIL AND HONEST PUBLIC         
20110113021214.000|20110113021216.000|CC1|DISCOURSE CAN HELP US FACE UP TO
20110113021216.000|20110113021219.000|CC1|THE CHALLENGES OF OUR NATION, IN
20110113021219.000|20110113021220.000|CC1|A WAY THAT WOULD MAKE THEM      
20110113021220.000|20110113021256.000|CC1|PROUD.                          
20110113021256.000|20110113021257.000|CC1|WE SHOULD BE CIVIL BECAUSE WE   
20110113021257.000|20110113021259.000|CC1|WANT TO LIVE UP TO THE EXAMPLE  
20110113021259.000|20110113021301.000|CC1|OF PUBLIC SERVANTS LIKE JOHN    
20110113021301.000|20110113021304.000|CC1|ROLL AND GABBY GIFFORDS WHO KNEW
20110113021304.000|20110113021305.000|CC1|FIRST AND FOREMOST THAT WE ARE  
20110113021305.000|20110113021307.000|CC1|ALL AMERICANS, AND THAT WE CAN  
20110113021307.000|20110113021310.000|CC1|QUESTION EACH OTHER'S IDEAS     
20110113021310.000|20110113021312.000|CC1|WITHOUT QUESTIONING EACH OTHER'S
20110113021312.000|20110113021313.000|CC1|LOVE OF COUNTRY.                
20110113021313.000|20110113021315.000|CC1|AND THAT OUR TASK, WORKING      
20110113021315.000|20110113021317.000|CC1|TOGETHER, WAS TO CONSTANTLY     
20110113021317.000|20110113021320.000|CC1|WIDEN THE CIRCLE OF OUR CONCERN.
20110113021320.000|20110113021323.000|CC1|THAT WE BEQUEATH THE AMERICAN   
20110113021323.000|20110113021335.000|CC1|DREAM TO FUTURE GENERATIONS.    
20110113021335.000|20110113021340.000|CC1|THEY BELIEVE -- THEY BELIEVE AND
20110113021340.000|20110113021342.000|CC1|I BELIEVE THAT WE CAN BE BETTER,
20110113021342.000|20110113021346.000|CC1|THOSE WHO DIED HERE, THOSE WHO  
20110113021346.000|20110113021347.000|CC1|SAVED LIVES HERE, THEY HELPED ME
20110113021347.000|20110113021350.000|CC1|BELIEVE.                        
20110113021350.000|20110113021354.000|CC1|WE MAY NOT BE ABLE TO STOP ALL  
20110113021354.000|20110113021356.000|CC1|EVIL IN THE WORLD, BUT I KNOW   
20110113021356.000|20110113021358.000|CC1|THAT HOW WE TREAT ONE ANOTHER,  
20110113021358.000|20110113021405.000|CC1|THAT'S ENTIRELY UP TO US.       
20110113021405.000|20110113021408.000|CC1|AND I BELIEVE THAT FOR ALL OUR  
20110113021408.000|20110113021411.000|CC1|IMPERFECTIONS, WE ARE FULL OF   
20110113021411.000|20110113021412.000|CC1|DECENCY AND GOODNESS AND THAT   
20110113021412.000|20110113021414.000|CC1|THE FORCES THAT DIVIDE US ARE   
20110113021414.000|20110113021416.000|CC1|NOT AS STRONG AS THOSE THAT     
20110113021416.000|20110113021427.000|CC1|UNITE US.                       
20110113021427.000|20110113021431.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE.          
20110113021431.000|20110113021433.000|CC1|IN PART, BECAUSE THAT'S WHAT A  
20110113021433.000|20110113021436.000|CC1|CHILD LIKE CHRISTINA TAYLOR     
20110113021436.000|20110113021443.000|CC1|GREEN BELIEVED.
